name: City Exploration
description: Easy game which tests you basic navigation abilities. Complete all the activities, share your results with friends and make your parents and friends proud!

points.name: Environmental Awareness - Recycling and Sustainability
points.description: Good morning! It’s time to take the trash out. There are five destinations you must bring the trash to. From your starting point, assign a number to each destination (between 1 and 5) according to the order of stops you’d like to travel. Points are awarded for the shortest route!

task.question: Whats the name of Alex's city?
